name: something that feels like waiting
description:
Tryna keep the balance, I'm stayin' strong
Kendrick Lamar - Rich Spirit


A short kinetic novel
that tells the story of a lonely and 'failed' game developer
waiting for the sky to clear up.



This project comes from months of reflection about
game development, working with other people, friendship, and art.
It is composed of photographs that
my girlfriend and I took over the last few months
and mixed & edited sounds.

I hope you will enjoy it.
